mention.text: bogota , 21 aug 89 -- eduardo martinez romero , the alleged `` comptroller '' of the medellin cartel
the most important one since the army and police launched an offensive against the drug trafficking mafia last saturday
martinez romero , one of the drug traffickers most wanted by the u.s. drug enforcement administration
the largest world cocaine trafficking organization , which staged a series of violent actions last week
the largest world cocaine trafficking organization
the colombian government 's new provisions adopted in view of the wave of violence
pablo escobar gaviria and gonzalo rodriguez gacha
the `` drug lords '' of the medellin cartel
